dmcaText:
All information's regarding data & sms plans are taken from public domain. Some plans may be different from actual plan. We always try to show you Jio's letest updated recharge  plans. We (Jio 4G Plans App) are not responsible for information. If you by mistake recharge any wrong plans it's not our responsible it's your fault.
    
    If you have any issues using this app please feel free to Email us.
